所羅門王求智慧 1大衛的兒子所羅門鞏固了自己的王位.因為他的上帝耶和華與他同在,使他極其偉大. 2所羅門召集所有以色列人,包括千夫長,百夫長,審判官,首領和族長, 3與他們一起去基遍的邱壇,因為那裡有上帝的會幕,是耶和華的僕人摩西在曠野製造的. 4大衛已經把上帝的約櫃從基列·耶琳搬到耶路撒冷,因為他在那裡為約櫃搭了一個帳篷. 5戶珥的孫子,烏利的兒子比撒列造的銅壇在基遍耶和華的會幕前,所羅門和會眾就在那裡求問耶和華. 6所羅門上到耶和華會幕前的銅壇那裡,獻上一千頭祭牲作為燔祭. 7當天晚上,上帝向所羅門顯現,問他:「你要我給你什麼?只管求吧.」 8所羅門回答說:「你厚待我父大衛,並讓我繼位. 9耶和華上帝啊,求你成就你給我父大衛的應許.你立我為王,使我統治這多如地上塵土的百姓. 10現在,求你賜我智慧和知識以帶領他們.不然,誰能治理這麼多的百姓呢?」 11上帝對所羅門說:「你既然有此心願,不為自己求富貴,資財,尊榮,長壽,也沒有求滅絕你的敵人,只求智慧和知識以治理我的子民——我交在你王權之下的百姓, 12我必賜你智慧和知識,並且我還要賜你空前絕後的富貴,資財和尊榮.」 13於是,所羅門

Baebolo ne maa yɛnwu kɛ Belemgbunli Devidi dɛnlanle aze wɔ Yizilayɛ wɔ ɛvoya 11 K.Y.M. na ɔ bo zo amra lile ebia wɔ ɛvolɛ ɛya dɔɔnwo anu. Noko menli bie mɔ su kpolera kɛ Devidi biala andɛnla aze na ɔle nwɔra nu sonla bie ala. Asoo amgba Belemgbunli Devidi dɛnlanle aze? Wɔ 1993, Avraham Biran mɔɔ ɔle azetuduvo la nee ye ekpunli ne nwunle bolɛ sinli bie wɔ Tel Dan mɔɔ wɔ Yizilayɛ sɔlɔ la, na ɛnee bɛhɛlɛ edwɛkɛ “Devidi Abo Zo Amra” wɔ zo. Wɔ ɛhulolɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ɛkɛ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo kɛ anwuma la.” (Mateyu 6:9, 10) Duzu a le Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne? Duzu a ɔyɛ a? Duzu ati a ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ nwolɛ asɔne a? Russia yɛ ɔman a efi northern Eurasia so. Ɛhwɛ aseɛ ma wɔ so nyinaa bɔ Russia na wɔ hyiase pii a wodi kan mu no na wɔteɛ wɔn ho kɔɔ ntɔmme aduonu 145 miliɔn. Russia gya Denmark, Finland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Belarus, Ukraine, Georgia, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, China, North Korea nso ne Mongolia. Capital city ne nkran no yɛ Moscow. Nrepɛwso ɔyɛ Russian, na mpeduaseɛ no yɛ Russian ruble. Russia fi akɔnɔmu ma nkɔsohwee nyinaa gye wɔn ho nsɛm, wɔdin aduane, pramkronkron, susudua ne toaseɛwɔkɛseɛmu. Russia ahyɛ kɔma nkwantwie mu, na ɛdeɛn na aseɛ ahyɛ koraa yi so ne ɔdɔ a, mmienu asa. Russia yɛ ɔdaapa nhoma anaa toaseɛwɔkɛseɛ sɛ nsuo, muntie, afuom ne asaase mu. Nnipa nyinaa bo soro hwɛ yɛn asɛm no nni nkwasiasem a ɛbɛyɛ a wɔnam no ma nkwa yɛn ho na wɔatumi atoto wɔn yaregyaseɛ ne nsɛm. Russia yɛ nneɛma ni dwumafo ahyɛ adeɛ mu ho nti, nso yɛ ahotɔ sɛ ɔnea ɔbaa tuu yaregyaseɛ, anigye ne nsɛm a wɔtiriw sikafete.

Abaayewa bi a ɔde Jeannie nso, bere a odii mfe nson no, ne maame nyaa kokoram wɔ ne mmadwoa mu. Maame no koo yare no afe baako, na ɛno akyi no owui. * Mmofra mmiɛnsa a yɛaka wɔn ho asɛm yi, wɔannyin annu baabiara na wɔn awofo wui mpofirim. Asɛm a ɛte saa ato wo pɛn? - Wɔatwerɛ nsɛm wei ɛwɔ Asante kasa mu Russia (Russia kasa mu: Poccия, Rossiya, [rɐˈsʲijə]), anaa Russia Aman Nkabom no yɛ ɔman a ɛwɔ asasepɔn no so a ɛtrɛw kɔ Europa Apuei Fam ne Asia Atifi fam. Ɛyɛ ɔman a ɛso sen biara wɔ wiase, na n’asasesin a wogye tom wɔ aman horow so no kɛse yɛ kilomita ahinanan 17,098,246 (6,601,670 sq mi), na ɛka Asase asase a wotumi tena so no nkyem awotwe mu biako ho. Russia trɛw fa bere nhyehyɛe du-baako so na ɛne aman dunan kyɛ asase hye. Ɛyɛ ɔman a ɛto so akron a nnipa dɔɔso sen biara wɔ wiase ne ɔman a nnipa dɔɔso sen biara wɔ Europa, na nnipa bɛboro ɔpepem 147 na wɔte mu. Ɔman no ahenkurow ne kurow a ɛso sen biara ne Moscow. Saint Petersburg yɛ Russia amammerɛ beae ne kurow a ɛto so abien a ɛso sen biara. Nkurow akɛse afoforo bi ne Novosibirsk, Yekaterinburg, Nizhny Novgorod, ne Kazan.

Aseɛ he aso haw mukoraati kyire kyɛ ɔngɔhyɛ Nyameɛpiri Ahennie ne kɔwa. Luka 21:10, 11; 2 Timoteo 3:1-5 Bible ne hãne nningyein bɔ osisi ɛnnɛ nanwo dwirɛ tole berɛ. Ɔhãne kyɛ sona kɔyɛ keka, sikanyeboroɛ, awofoɛ so asoserɛ, ɔne bɛbɔ bɛdɔ anigyedeɛ ɔ. Ɔhãne kyɛ aseɛwosolɛ, kõɛ, ɛhɔen, ɔne anwonyerɛ pẽe kɔwa. Ɛnnɛ̀, nningyein hemɔ mukoraati sisi. Yesu sa hãne kyɛ bɛkɔhã Ahennie ne nwo nzɛmba wɔ ewiase mukoraati. Ahennie ne kɔye nningyein tɛɛ kofi berɛ. 2 Petro 3:13 Ɔngɔhyɛ Yehowa kɔsɛkye abɔnefoɛ ne mukoraati. Bɛkɔhwẽ Satan ne y’adaemɔne nemɔ so. Bɛkole bɛ bɔ betie Nyameɛpiri ne ngoa wɔ ewiase foforɛ nanu, esurolɛ nne berɛ kõ, bɛkɔ dodɔ bɛnwo, na sona konya ebiala nu ahotosoɛ.

Nyankopɔn nam Bible no do na ɔkasa kyerɛ hɛn. 2 Timothy 3:16 Nokwar Nyankopɔn no nam nyimpa do kyerɛɛw n’adwen wɔ nwoma krɔnkrɔn bi mu. Dɛm nwoma no nye Bible no. No mu nsɛm no yɛ ehiasɛm bi a Nyankopɔn pɛ dɛ ihu. Nyankopɔn na onyim dza oye ma hɛn, na ɔno nye nyansa nyinara ne Fibea. Sɛ itsie no a, ebɛyɛ onyansafo. Nyankopɔn pɛ dɛ nyimpa biara a ɔwɔ asaase yi do kenkan Bible no. Sesei, woetsintsim no wɔ kasa pii mu. Sɛ epɛ dɛ itsie Nyankopɔn dze a, ɔsɛ dɛ ekenkan Bible no na etse ase. Worusũa Bible no wɔ aman nyinara do. Matthew 28:19 Jehovah Adasefo botum aboa wo ma aatse Bible no ase. Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nokwar a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho wɔ wiadze yi mu beebiara. Sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ wo a, irunntua hwee. Ibotum so eekosũa Nyankopɔn ho adze wɔ beebi a Jehovah Adasefo hyia mu, wɔfrɛ hɔ Ahendzi Asado.

SEPTEMBER 9, 2019 FOFOLƐ MƆƆ ƐRA Bɛyele Ngɛlɛlera Nwuanzanwuanza—Ewiade Fofolɛ Ngilebɛbo ne wɔ Venda aneɛ nu yɛɛ bɛyele Ewiade Fofolɛ Ngilebɛbo ne mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye fofolɛ la wɔ Afrikaans nee Xhosa aneɛ nu wɔ September 6, 2019, wɔ Johannesburg, South Africa. Ye alehyenlɛ nu, bɛyele Ewiade Fofolɛ Ngilebɛbo ne mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye fofolɛ la wɔ Czech nee Slovak aneɛ nu wɔ Ostrava, Czech Republic. Eza bɛye Ewiade Fofolɛ Ngilebɛbo ne wɔ Turkmen aneɛ nu. Bɛhile Ewiade Fofolɛ Ngilebɛbo ne amuala anzɛɛ ye foa bie abo bɛhɔ aneɛ 184 anu, bɛgyinlanle 2013 ɛdeɛ ne azo bɛyɛ nuhua 29 amuala fofolɛ.

Ɛka ɔkwan a Onyankopɔn de nnipa fa so nso ho asɛm. Wɔtumi kyɛ Gyenesis nwoma no mu mmienu ma ɛyɛ yie. 1. Ti 1—11 ka sɛdeɛ wɔbɔɔ wiase ne adasamma ho abakɔsɛm. Ɛha na wɔka Adam ne Hawa, Kain ne Habel, Noa ne nsuyire no ne Babel Abantenten no ho asɛm. 2. Ti 12—50 ka Israelfoɔ tetefoɔ ho asɛm. Abraham na ɔdi kan. Ne gyidie ne ɔse

Ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ kyerɛw wɔ din George Awoonor-Williams, na wɔsan tintim no sɛ Kofi Nyidevu Awoonor. Ɔkyerɛɛ Afrika nwoma wɔ Ghana Suapɔn mu. Ɔbenfoɔ Awoonor ka wɔn a wɔkumm wɔn wɔ September

, nsusuwii ne abakɔsɛm a wɔka ho, a na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ne dwumadi wɔ ne wu anwummere no mu. George Loh George Loh yɛ mbrahyɛbaguanyi ma North Dayi a ɔwɔ Firaw Mantɔw mu wɔ Ghana. Seiseiara ɔyɛ Firaw Mantɔw mu oguamutsenanyi abadziekyir ma NDC. Abrabɔ mu nsɛm[sesa mu | sesa ekyirsɛm] Loh awar awo ba kor. Ɔyɛ Christianyi wɔ Evangelical Presbyterian asɔr mu. Abrabɔ ahyɛase na nwomasua[sesa mu | sesa ekyirsɛm] Wɔwoo Loh wɔ Ayɛwoho 3, 1972 wɔ Anfoega wɔ Firaw Mantɔw. Onyaa abodzin krataa a wɔfrɛ no LLB wɔ Ghana suapɛn mu wɔ afe 2005 mu. Ne nsa kaa abodzin krataa BL wɔ Ghana School of Law wɔ afe 2007 mu. Amanyɛsɛm[sesa mu | sesa ekyirsɛm] Loh yɛ National Democratic Congress kuwba. Nna ɔka beesuomfo a wɔhwɛ amambra, mbra mu nsɛm na mbrahyɛbagua na ɔman no nkontaabu do. Edwuma[sesa mu | sesa ekyirsɛm] Oak House and Wuuda a wɔyɛɛ wɔ Nkran no, nna ɔka ho dɛ mbranyimfo na ofotufo. Nna ɔsan ka Hayibor, Djarbeng and Company ho fitsi afe 2007 kesi afe 2012 mu.

- Wɔatwerɛ nsɛm wei ɛwɔ Asante kasa mu Dome Kwabenya(sɛnea yɛbɔ "Dome Kwabenya" (help·info)) ka mpasua a wɔn ananmusini wɔ Ghana Mmarahyɛbadwafie no ho.Ɛde 'first past the post' abatoɔ nhyehyeɛ no na eyi mmarahyɛbadwani baako. Dome Kwabenya mpasua no wɔ Ga East mansini a ɛwɔ Greater Accra Mantam wɔ Ghana. Mpasua no hyeɛ ahodoɔ nyinara wɔ Ga East Mansini mu wɔ Greater Accra Mantam wɔ Ghana. Wɔtee mpasua yi wɔ berɛ a na wɔrebɛto afe 2004 abatoɔ no. Woyii mpasua yi firii Abokobi-Madina mpasua no mu.

Owusu Achaw Duah yɛ Ghana Datser na amanyɛnyi. Ɔno nye panyin pa(CEO) na prɛsedɛnt wɔ Martin Luther King Health Training School. Wɔ 2006 mu no, wɔpaw dɛ mbrahyɛbaguanyi dze ma Offinso South abatow mpasua do wɔ aba wɔtoo no bio ɔnam Kwabena Sarfo no wui wɔ Dzifuu 2006. Owusu nyaa ne ordinary na advanced lɛbol(level) abɔdzin krataa wɔ Konongo Odumase Ntoado Skuul na Opoku Ware Ntoado Skuul ahorow pɛpɛɛpɛ. Owiei wɔ University of Ghana Medical School wɔ 1973 na ɔsan so kitsa post-graduate dipolma wɔ Telemedicine mu. Owusu gyinae na odzii nkonyim wɔ Offinso South abatow mpasua do abaa wɔtoo no bio wɔ 2006 wɔ New Patriotic Party amanyɛkuw dzin mu. Ɔyɛ Datser wɔ Dr. Martin Luther King Clinic wɔ Nkran na 'external examiner' wɔ Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology. Ɔyɛ lɛkyela(lecturer) na nkan Head of Chemical Pathology Department of University of Ghana Medical School. Owusu awar wɔ mba beenum.

Sua yɛ nhyiamu ahoroɛ ne nwo dwirɛ pẽe. Pena nekaa bɔ beyianu bɔ opingye wɔ ɔ. Nzu Yeɛ Ɔkɔ So Wɔ Y’asafo Nhyiamu Ahoroɛ Bo Ɔ? Dapɛn biala Yehowa Adanzefoɛ yianu pɛnyɔ sõ. (Hebrifoɛ 10:24, 25) Wɔ nhyiamu he bo ne, wabukye ye nwo atẽe ma ebiala kora ba bie. Yesusu bɔ Bible ne kyirekyire ne atẽe bɔ yɛkɔfa so na yafa enu dwirɛ yabɔ yɛ bra nanwo. Wɔ yɛ nhyiamu pẽe nu ne, bebukye ye nwo atẽe maa bɛ bɔ bɛba ne ma mmuaeɛ wɔ ye bo, tekyɛ bɔ bɛyɛ ye wɔ sukuu sua nu ne. Yɛfa edwein ne mbaeɛ yɛhyɛ yɛ nhyiamu ahoroɛ n’abo na yasa yafa yayie. Nna bɛ bɔ bɛte Yehowa Adanzefoɛ ngome yeɛ bɛba sɔ nhyiamu he bie ɔ, bɛ bɔ bɛtte adanzefoɛ koso kora ba bie. Yɛto yɛsa yɛfrɛ ebiala maa ɔba bie. Bennide sikaa biala wɔ berɛ.

Adiyisɛm - Wɔatwerɛ nsɛm wei ɛwɔ Asante kasa mu Adiyisɛm yɛ nhoma a ɛtwa toɔ wɔ apam foforo no mu. Yohane na ɛtwerɛ saa nhoma yi nanso sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno anaa nnipa foforo bi na ɛtaa saa nhoma no akyi no, kye sɛ da foforo na yɛ bɛ ka ho asem. Nhoma yi kasa fa neɛma miensa ho, wiase seɛye, krataa twerɛ ne nea ɛbesi wɔ enda a edi anin no mu. ɛhyɛ aseɛ ebere a Yohane twerɛ krataa kɔ maa asore nsɔn wɔ Asia. Ɔkasa faa neɛma pii a ɛfa ɛnkomhyɛ a ɛfa anisoadehunu ho. saa neɛma no bi ne, aboa ɔwɔ, yesu mmbae a ɛtɔ so ebien, aboa a ne ti yɛ nsɔn ho ne nea ɛke ka ho. Kristofo bi nom se adiyisɛm kasa fa tete nyame nkorofo a ɛtwamu kɔ, ɛbi nso se ɛkasa fa nea ɛbe si daakye bi mu. Nanso adiyis3n nkasa mfa nipa kuw bi ho anaa neɛma bi ho, na ɛmom ɛkasa fa honhom mu asem ne nsonsonyɛ a ɛda pa pa ne bone ntɛm. Beaɛ a asɛm no firi[sesa]

So Onyankopɔn wɔ din? EBINOM KA SƐ onni din, afoforo nso ka sɛ ne din de Onyankopɔn anaa Awurade, na nnipa bi nso ka sɛ ne din de, ɛdɔɔso. Wo nso ɛ? NEA BIBLE NO KA “Wo a wo din de Yehowa no, wo nko ara ne Ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.”—Dwom 83:18. DƐN BIO NA BIBLE NO KA? Ɛwom sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ abodin ahorow pii de, nanso wama n’ankasa ne ho din.—Exodus 3:15. Yebetumi ahu onii ko a Onyankopɔn yɛ; ɔpɛ sɛ yehu no.—Asomafo Nnwuma 17:27. Ade a edi kan a ɛbɛma yɛatumi afa Onyankopɔn adamfo ne sɛ yebehu ne din.—Yakobo 4:8. Ɛyɛ mfomso sɛ yɛbɛbɔ Onyankopɔn din anaa? WUBEBUA SƐN? Yiw Dabi Egyina sɛnea wode bedi dwuma so NEA BIBLE NO KA “Mfa Yehowa wo Nyankopɔn din nni agoru.” (Exodus 20:7) Ɛyɛ mfomso sɛ wode Onyankopɔn din bedi dwuma wɔ ɔkwammɔne so.—Yeremia 29:9. Onyankopɔn atamfo bɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛma nkurɔfo werɛ afi ne din.—Yeremia 23:27.

Nea Bible ka Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbɔ mpaeɛ wɔ Yesu din mu ɛfisɛ ɛno nko ara na ɛbɛma Onyankopɔn atie yɛn mpaebɔ. Yesu kaa sɛ: “Mene ɛkwan no ne nokorɛ no ne nkwa. Obiara mma Agya no nkyɛn gye sɛ ɔnam me so. ” (Yohane 14:6) Yesu san ka kyerɛɛ n’asomafoɔ anokwafoɔ no sɛ: “Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo sɛ, biribiara a mobɛbisa Agya no ɔde bɛma mo me din mu. ”—Yohane 16:23. Nea ɛdidi so yi ka ho bi nti na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbɔ mpaeɛ wɔ Yesu din mu Yɛde hyɛ Yesu ne n’Agya Yehowa Nyankopɔn anuonyam.—Filipifoɔ 2:9-11. Yɛyɛ saa de kyerɛ sɛ yɛn ani sɔ nhyehyɛeɛ a Onyankopɔn yɛ maa Yesu bɛwu gyee yɛn nkwa no.—Mateo 20:28; Asomafoɔ Nnwuma 4:12. Yɛde kyerɛ sɛ yɛgye tom sɛ Yesu pɛ ne Onyankopɔn ne nnipa ntamgyinafoɔ.—Hebrifoɔ 7:25. Yɛde kyerɛ sɛ yɛn ani sɔ Yesu dwumadie sɛ Ɔsɔfo Panyin a ɔbɛtumi aboa yɛn ma yɛne Onyankopɔn ntam ayɛ papa.—Hebrifoɔ 4:14-16.

Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw ye kuro kesee a ɛwɔ Nkran ne Kumasi ntam. Nipa bɛyɛ mpem aduannan nwɔtwe na ɛwɔ Nkawkaw (48.000) Yɛfrɛ wɔn Kwahufoɔ. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Nnipa no pii firi Ɔbomen. Nipa bebree a wɔfiri Nkawkaw yɛ adwadifoɔ kesee.Wɔn mu bebree te Nkran. Wɔn wo sika pa ara nti wɔn asisi adan fefeefe wɔ Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa wɔn ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Ɔbomen). Eho yɛ fɛ pa ara. Afe biara Kwahufo kɔ Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantam nyinaa kɔdi Yesu Wusɔreɛ (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuropɔn no ho. Sukuu titire baako a ɛwɔ hɔ ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Ntoasoɔ Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wɔ hɔ.

Air New Zealand yɛ Nkrabea ɛsua nnwom ase mmiɛnsa Nwudome. Saa nkɔmɔfoɔ kɔkɔbɔ no bɛɛhwehwɛe wɔ 1940 mu sɛ yahu maheadkɔ no bewu no wɔ Auckland. Saa nnwom ase mmiɛnsa no yɛɛ nkɔmbɔ nnam wɔ mu ne maame bi so, na ɛwɔ dɛm wɔ Australia, Pacific Islands, Asia, North America, South America ne Europe mmepɔw. Air New Zealand yɛ ɛwɔ nteaseɛ no mu wɔ ahoomadan mu ne ne hyɛmusem ma ɛgyae ɛyɛ aseɛ mu ne nantwe nsuo kunu. Saa nnomnyi no yɛ Star Alliance a ɛma nnomadwafoɔ nyinaa yɛ mmosiakyire wɔ atɛteɛdeɛ ho nneɛma a wɔde ayɛ dwen ho bɛn nnomadwafoɔ no ansa na wɔabohyia ntwe adwuma mu.

Ɔsebɔ (subgenus Hippotigris) are African equines with distinctive black-and-white striped coats. There are three living species: Grévy's zebra (Equus grevyi), the plains zebra (E. quagga), and the mountain zebra (E. zebra). Zebras share the genus Equus with horses and asses, the three groups being the only living members of the family Equidae. Zebra stripes come in different patterns, unique to each individual. Adwuma bɛn na asafo mu asomfo yɛ ma yenya so mfaso? Wɔboa asafo mu mpanyimfo no. Asafo mu asomfo yɛ mmarima a wɔne Yehowa wɔ abusuabɔ a emu yɛ den, yetumi de yɛn ho to wɔn so, na wɔyɛ nsi; wɔn mu bi yɛ mmerante na ebinom nso yɛ mpanyin. Wo ho nsɛm a wode bɛhyehyɛ hɔ no, ɛbɛboa yɛn ama yɛahu nhyehyɛe a yɛbɛyɛ ama obi abɛsra wo; yɛremfa nyɛ biribi foforo biara. Wei ne Nhyehyɛe a Yɛde Di Nkurɔfo Ho Nsɛm Ho Dwuma Wɔ Wiase Nyinaa no hyia. Wobɛte Yɛn Nka Wohyehyɛ fɔɔm no wie a, nnawɔtwe baako anaa mmienu ntam no, Yehowa Danseni bi bɛhwehwɛ w’akyi kwan. Sua Bible Sua nea Bible ka fa nsɛm pii a ɛkyere adwene ho. Wopɛ nso a, ma wɔnkyerɛ wo sɛnea yɛne nkurɔfo bɔ Bible mu nkɔmmɔ a wuntua sika biara. Nhweren - Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu Nhwiren, a ɛtɔ mmere bi a wɔfrɛ no nhwiren anaa nhwiren, ne awo nhyehyɛe a wohu wɔ afifide a ɛsow nhwiren mu (afifide a ɛwɔ mpaapaemu Angiospermae mu). Abɔde mu dwumadi a nhwiren yɛ ne sɛ ɛbɛma awo ayɛ mmerɛw, mpɛn pii no denam ɔkwan bi a ɛma mmadwoa ne nkesua bom so. Nhwiren betumi ama outcrossing (nkwaboaa ne nkesua a efi ankorankoro ahorow mu a wɔde bɛka abom wɔ nnipa dodow bi mu) a efi cross-pollination mu ba no ayɛ mmerɛw anaasɛ ɛbɛma kwan ma s

Yohane Adiyisɛm 1Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI) 1 Saa nhoma yi fa adiyisɛm a Onyankopɔn de maa Yesu Kristo ma ɔdaa no adi kyerɛɛ nea ɛrebɛba kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn asomfo no ho. Kristo somaa n’abɔfo kɔɔ Yohane nkyɛn kɔdaa asɛm yi adi kyerɛɛ ne somfo, 2 na Yohane aka biribiara a ohui nyinaa. Eyi ne n’adansedi ne asɛm a efi Onyankopɔn nkyɛn ne nokware a Yesu Kristo daa no adi no. 3 Nhyira nka obiara a ɔbɛkan saa nhoma yi, na nhyira nka wɔn nso a wotie adiyisɛm no na wodi so sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ saa nhoma yi mu no.
